<B>
	(&ldquo;Guarantor&rdquo;)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: RULE-PAGE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; WIDTH: 100%">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /RULE-PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Supplementary Agreement (II) to Agreement for Sale of 100% Equities
	of iSTAR International Futures Co. Limited and 100% Equities of iSTAR International Wealth Management Co. Limited
</B>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: RULE-PAGE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; WIDTH: 100%">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /RULE-PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 41 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage244"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Supplementary Agreements dated on September 28, 2015
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	is
	concluded and entered into by and among the following Parties:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Contracting Parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(1)
<B>
	ISTAR CAPITAL INTERNATIONAL CO. LIMITED
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
	a limited company registered and organized in
</FONT>
	British Virgin Islands, with the registered office at P.O.
<B>
</B>
	Box
<B>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	957,
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
	Offshore
<B>
</B>
	Incorporations
<B>
</B>
	Centre
<B>
</B>
	Road
<B>
</B>
	Town
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
</FONT>
	Tortola
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
</FONT>
	British
<B>
</B>
	Virgin
<B>
</B>
	Islands (&ldquo;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Capital International&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(2)
<B>
	ISTAR MANAGEMENT LIMITED
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
	a limited company registered and organized in
</FONT>
	British Virgin Islands, with the registered office at P.O.
<B>
</B>
	Box
<B>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	957,
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
	Offshore
<B>
</B>
	Incorporations
<B>
</B>
	Centre
<B>
</B>
	Road
<B>
</B>
	Town
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
</FONT>
	Tortola
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
	British
<B>
</B>
	Virgin
<B>
</B>
	Islands (&ldquo;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Management&rdquo;, collectively referred
	to as the &ldquo;Transferors&rdquo; together with iSTAR Capital International
</FONT>
	)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(3)
<B>
	Tianfeng Securities Co., Ltd.
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	,
	a company limited by shares that is registered and organized in Wuhan, Hubei, China, with the registered office at 37F, Tower A,
	Poly Plaza, No. 99 of Zhongnan Road, Wuchang District, Wuhan, Hubei, China (the &ldquo;Buyer&rdquo;); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(4) Beijing Fuhua Innovation &amp; Technology Development Co., Ltd.,
	a limited liability company that is registered and organized in Beijing China, with the registered address at: A1701, 1702, 1703,
	1705, 1706, and 1707, No. 28 Xuanwumenwai Avenue, Xicheng District, Beijing, China (the &ldquo;Guarantor&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Foreword:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(A) The Buyer,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Capital International, iSTAR Management,
	and the Guarantor signed on March 30, 2015 an agreement for sale of all equities of iSTAR Futures and iSTAR Wealth and a supplementary
	Agreement to the foregoing sale agreement on April 9, 2015 (hereinafter collectively referred to as the &ldquo;
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	&rdquo;).
	According to the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	, if any of the Conditions Precedent stated in Article 3.1 of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	cannot
	be satisfied or be waived or exempted by the Buyer on September 30, 2015 or a later date approved by the Parties in writing, the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	and the matters stated therein as well as the rights and obligations of the Parties hereto, subject to not
	conflicting the liabilities of any Party to the other Party for the breach of any provision of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	before
	the termination hereof, the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	shall lose effect and terminate as of October 1, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(B)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	The Parties to the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	hereby
	agree to extend the term of the Conditions Precedent mentioned in Article 3.2 of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	pursuant to this Supplementary
	Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Now therefore, the Parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	1.
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
	Definitions
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1 Unless otherwise required by the context, the terms and words defined in the
<I>
	Sale
	Agreement
</I>
	shall have the same meaning when used in this Supplementary Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2 The statutory provisions mentioned shall be construed to be the amendment and revision
	of such provisions from time to time, or change in the application thereof according to the other provisions (whether the change
	is made before or after the date of this Supplementary Agreement) and to include the newly formulated provisions (whether amended
	or not).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.3 The provisions and schedules mentioned refer to the provisions and schedules of this
	Supplementary Agreement. The schedules hereto (if any) shall be deemed to constitute a part of this Supplementary Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 42 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage245"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.4 The headings are for convenience only and shall not affect the interpretation of
	this Supplementary Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.5 In this Supplementary Agreement, words importing the singular include the plural
	and vice versa; words importing gender or neutral gender include any genders and a reference to a person includes corporate bodies
	and unincorporated bodies.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.6 The document of provisions subject to approval means a document whose provisions
	have been approved by the Parties hereto or the representatives thereof and that has been signed by the Parties hereto or the representatives
	thereof for identification.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.
<B>
<U>
	Extension of the Term of Conditions Precedent
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Buyer, the Transferors and the Guarantor unconditionally and irrevocably agree to
	extend the deadline mentioned in Article 3.2 of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	from September 30, 2015 to December 31, 2015. in case
	any precedent condition stated in the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	cannot be satisfied, or be waived
	or exempted by the Buyer on December 31, 2015 or a later date approved by the Parties in writing, the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	, this
	Supplementary Agreement, and the matters stated therein as well as the rights and obligations of the Parties hereto, subject to
	not conflicting the liabilities of any Party to the other Party for the breach of any provision of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	and
	this Supplementary Agreement before the termination hereof, the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	and this Supplementary Agreement shall lose
	effect and terminate as of January 1, 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
	General Provisions
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.1 Article 9, Article 12 through Article 19 (including
	the beginning and ending provisions) of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	shall apply to this Supplementary Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.2 This Supplementary Agreement is an integral part
	of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	; if there is any discrepancy between this Supplementary Agreement and the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	, this
	Supplementary Agreement shall prevail.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.3 Unless otherwise explicitly stated in this Supplementary
	Agreement, this Supplementary Agreement shall not constitute an amendment to any provisions of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.4 This Supplementary Agreement may be signed in any
	number of copies and all copies shall constitute one and the same agreement. Any Party hereto may sign this Supplementary Agreement
	by signing a copy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.5 This Supplementary Agreement shall be governed
	by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong. The other provisions of the
<I>
	Sale Agreement
</I>
	shall remain unchanged.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	[The remainder of this page is intentionally left blank]
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	In witness whereof, this Agreement
	is signed on the date stated on the first page.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Supplementary Agreements dated on April 9, 2015
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	is
	concluded and entered into by and among the following Parties:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Contracting Parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(1)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	ISTAR CAPITAL INTERNATIONAL
	CO. LIMITED, a limited company registered and organized in
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
	British Virgin Islands, with the registered office at
	P.O.
<B>
</B>
	Box
<B>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	957,
</FONT>

<B>

<B>

<B>
	,
</B>

<B>
	,
</B>
	British
<B>
</B>
	Virgin
<B>
</B>
	Islands (&ldquo;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Capital International&rdquo;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(2)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	ISTAR MANAGEMENT LIMITED,
	a limited company registered and organized in
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
	British Virgin Islands, with the registered office at P.O.
<B>
</B>
	Box
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	957,
</FONT>
<B>

	Offshore
<B>

<B>
</B>

<B>

<B>

</B>

<B>

<B>
</B>
	Islands (&ldquo;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Management&rdquo;, collectively
	referred to as the &ldquo;Transferors&rdquo; together with iSTAR Capital International
</FONT>
<B>
	)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(3)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Tianfeng Securities Co.,
	Ltd., a company limited by shares that is registered and organized in Wuhan, Hubei, China, with the registered office at 37F,
	Tower A, Poly Plaza, No. 99 of Zhongnan Road, Wuchang District, Wuhan, Hubei, China (the &ldquo;Buyer&rdquo;); and
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(4) Beijing Fuhua Innovation &amp; Technology Development Co.,
	Ltd., a limited liability company registered and organized in Beijing, China, with the registered address at Rooms 938-941, Tower
	C, International Enterprise Building, No.35 of Finance Street, Xicheng District, Beijing, China
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	(the
	&ldquo;Guarantor&rdquo;)
</FONT>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(The foregoing Parties are collectively referred to as the Parties)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Whereas:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1. The Parties signed the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
<I>
	Agreement for Sale of
	100% Equities of
</I>
</FONT>
<I>
	iSTAR International Futures Co. Limited and
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	100% Equities of
</FONT>
	iSTAR International Wealth Management Co. Limited
</I>
	(&ldquo;Original Agreement&ldquo;) on March 30, 2015;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2. The Original Agreement stipulates that, within ten working days after the Original
	Agreement is signed, the Buyer shall deposit a Down Payment of forty million Hong Kong dollars (HK$40,000,000) in a lump sum in
	the bank account of thetransferee;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3. Subject to the provisions of existing and effective laws of the place where the Buyer
	is located, the Buyer is unable to complete the payment of the Down Payment specified in the Original Agreement to the Transferors
	within the period set forth in the Original Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Now therefore, the Parties understand and supplementarily reach and conclude the following
	agreement:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1. The Buyer shall, within five working days after this Supplementary Agreement is signed,
	pay RMB 33,000,000 Yuan (the &ldquo;Payment&rdquo;) to the Guarantor of the Original Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2. The Payment shall serve as a cash deposit for the consideration specified in the
	Original Agreement and shall, within five working days after the completion of the payment of the total transfer price prescribed
	in the Original Agreement, be returned by the Guarantor of the original Agreement to the Buyer;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3. The bank account information of Guarantor of the Original Agreement for receiving
	the cash deposit for the consideration paid by the Buyer is:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Company name: Beijing Fuhua Innovation &amp; Technology Development Co., Ltd.&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Bank name: Bank of Communications, Beijing Municipal Branch, Business Department&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Account number: 110060149012015083356
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 46 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage249"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4. Any matter not stated in this Supplementary Agreement shall be implemented pursuant
	to the provisions of the Original Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	-------------------The remainder of this page is intentionally left blank-----------
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	On
	March 30, 2015, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Contracting Parties signed a sale
	&amp; purchase agreement about the 100% equity of iSTAR International Futures Co. Limited
	and iSTAR international Wealth Management Co. Limited (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Pursuant
	the Agreement, the Buyer need to pay HK$ 40 million to the bank account designated by
	iSTAR Capital International and iSTAR Management within 10 working days after the sign
	of the Agreement
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	As
	limited by the laws and regulations in PRC, the Buyer cannot pay the HK$ 40 million as
	required in the Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Now therefore, the Contracting Parties reach and enter into an agreement
	as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Buyer pays RMB 33 million to the Guarantor within 5 working days after the sign of the Supplement
	(1).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Guarantor need to pay back the RMB 33 million to the Buyer within 5 working days after the
	Buyer paid all the considerations pursuant to the Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Hereunder is the bank accounts detail of the Guarantor to receive the RMB 33 million.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	For the clauses do not mentioned in the supplement (1), the Contracting Parties execute pursuant
	to the Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	A&#65294;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On March 30, 2015, the Buyer, the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Capital
	International
</FONT>
	and the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	iSTAR Management
</FONT>
<B>
</B>
	signed an agreement
	about the sale of the 100% equity of iSTAR International Futures Co. Limited and iSTAR international Wealth Management Co. Limited
	(collectively the &ldquo;
<B>
	Sale Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) and on April 9, 2015 a supplement about the Sale Agreement (Supplement (1)).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	According to the Sale Agreement, i
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	f
	any Conditions Precedent stated in Article 3.2 of the Sale Agreement cannot be satisfied or be waived or exempted by the Buyer
	on September 30, 2015 or a later date approved by the Parties hereto in writing, the Sale Agreement shall lose effect and terminate
	on Jan. 1, 2016, provided that the Sale Agreement, this Supplement and any matters covered thereby as well as the rights and obligations
	of each Party hereto shall not conflict with the liabilities assumed by any Party to the other Party for breaching any provisions
	hereof before the termination of this Agreement;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	B&#65294;Each of the Parties hereto agrees to extend the deadline
	for the conditions precedent mentioned in article 3.2 of the Sale Agreement pursuant to this Supplement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	NOW THEREFORE, the Contracting Parties reach and enter into an agreement
	as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Definitions
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Unless the context otherwise requires, the words and sentences defined in the Sale Agreement shall
	have the same meaning thereto when used herein.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Statutory provisions referred to herein shall mean the amendments, reenactment to or of such provisions
	or the modifications (whether modified before or after the date hereof) of applicability as per other provisions from time to time
	and include the reenacted provisions (whether changed or not).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The articles and schedules referred to herein shall mean those contained herein. Schedules to this
	Supplement (if any) shall be deemed to be a part of this Supplement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	1.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Titles and headings herein are for convenience only and shall not affect the construction of this
	Supplement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	1.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Words importing the singular include the plural and vice versa; Words importing any gender include
	every gender; and references to person are references to corporate body or unincorporated body.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	1.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The documents consisting of articles subject to approval mean the documents, the articles of which
	have been approved by each Party hereto or its representatives and that have been signed by each Party hereto or its representatives,
	for the purpose of identification.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Extension of Conditions Precedent Deadline
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	The Buyer, Transferor and Guarantor
	agree unconditionally and irrevocably that the deadline set forth in Article 3.2 of Sale Agreement will be extended from Sep. 30
	2015 to Dec. 31, 2015.
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: RED">
</FONT>
	i
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	f any Conditions Precedent
	stated in Article 3.2 of the Sale Agreement cannot be satisfied or be waived or exempted by the Buyer on September 30, 2015 or
	a later date approved by the Parties hereto in writing, the Sale Agreement shall lose effect and terminate on Jan. 1, 2016, provided
	that the Sale Agreement, this Supplement and any matters covered thereby as well as the rights and obligations of each Party hereto
	shall not conflict with the liabilities assumed by any Party to the other Party for breaching any provisions hereof before the
	termination of this Agreement;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	Article 9, 12 through 19 of the Sale Agreement (including Article 12 and 19) are applicable to
	this Supplement.
</TD>

	3.2

	Supplement and the Sale Agreement, this former shall control.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	contained in the Sale Agreement.
</TD>

	3.4

	one and same agreement; any contracting party may execute the supplement through signing a counterpart.
</TD>

</TABLE>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.118
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Agreement on Enforcement of Arbitration Award
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A: Fortune (Beijing) Huiying Investment Consultation Co.,
	Ltd. (&ldquo;CIC&rdquo;)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: Room 1136, 10, Xuanwumenwai Street, Xicheng District,
	Beijing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Legal representative: Yang Lin
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party B: Langfang Shengshi Real Estate Development Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: North of Eastern Section, Langba Road, Hancun Town, Yongqing
	County, Langfang
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Legal representative: Zhan Jiantao
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party C: Beijing Bluestone Investment Management Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: Room 605, Qingyun Dangdai Building, 9, Mantingfangyuan
	Community, Qingyun Lane, Haidian District, Beijing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Legal representative: Wang Ling
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party D: Wang Ling
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: 301, Unit 4, Building 19, Wan Liu Wan Quan Xin Xin Community,
	Haidian District, Beijing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	ID card number:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Whereas award Z. G. M. J. C. Zi No. 1130 (the &ldquo;Award&rdquo;)
	was made on October 23, 2015 with respect to dispute arising out of loan and equity transfer among the said four parties, which
	has been submitted to China International Economical and Trade Arbitration Commission. NOW THEREFORE the said four parties (collectively
	referred to as &ldquo;the Parties&rdquo;) have reached the following agreement with respect to enforcement of the award through
	equal negotiations for mutual observance and performance:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Parties have no objection to the result of the arbitration,
	and they all agree that Party A has the following creditor&rsquo;s rights to Party B, Party C and Party D according to such result:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1. Loan
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1 Principal: RMB55, 885, 080.65;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2 Fund occupation cost: RMB8, 833, 448.22 (from March 10, 2015
	to December 10, 2015 at annual interest rate of 21%);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2. Equity transfer price
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.1 Principal: RMB82, 000,000;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.2 Fund occupation cost: RMB 4, 373, 333.33(from September 21,
	2014 to December 31, 2014);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.3 Fund occupation cost: RMB16, 247, 903.23 (from January 1, 2015
	to December 10, 2015 at annual interest rate of 21%);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3 Attorney fee: RMB 500, 000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4 Arbitration fee: RMB 890.904.7
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Parties acknowledge the said debts are RMB168, 730, 670.13
	in total.
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage258"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 2
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A agrees that all the debts determined in the result of the
	arbitration will be discharged by Party B. If Party B could discharge the debts prior to December 10, 2015, Party A agrees to reduces
	the debt by RMB13,845,589.48 (including attorney fee of RMB500,000, arbitration cost of RMB890.904.7 and fund occupation cost of
	RMB12,454.684.78), that is to say, the total amount payable by Party B is RMB154,885,080.65, and Party B shall remit all the amounts
	to the following account of Party A prior to December 10, 2015:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Opening bank: China Construction Bank Beijing Fuxing Branch;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Account name: Fortune (Beijing) Huiying Investment Consultation
	Co., Ltd.;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Account number: 11001046500053004058
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 3
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	If Party B fully repaid the above debt within the agreed time limit,
	Party A shall, within 5 working days upon receipt of full repayment, coordinate with Party B in discharging all securities created
	for the said debt, and the result of the arbitration shall be deemed as have been enforced without objections by any party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 4
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	In the event that Party B fails to fully repaid the said debts within
	the agreed time limit set forth herein, Party A&rsquo;s undertaking of debt reduction will become invalid immediately, in which
	case Party A has the right to initiate award enforcement procedures and has the right of indemnity of all creditor&rsquo;s rights,
	and Party B, Party C and Party D shall bear the relevant legal liabilities according to result of the arbitration.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 5
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This agreement represents the consensus reached by the Parties in
	order to promote enforcement of the award, and shall not be deemed as replacement or alteration of the arbitration.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 6
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This agreement is made in quadruplicate, with each Party holding
	one copy. This agreement shall come into force immediately after being signed or affixed with seals by each Party. Each of those
	copies shall have the same legal effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(Intentionally left blank below)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Reorganization Framework Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This reorganization framework agreement (hereinafter referred to
	as the &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) was entered into by the following Parties (hereinafter referred to collectively as the &ldquo;Parties&rdquo;
	and individually as the &ldquo;Party&rdquo;) in Beijing on May 4, 2015:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	&#65288;1&#65289;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	China Finance Online Co., Ltd. (&rdquo;Financial Sector&rdquo;)
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Authorized representative:&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Residence&#65306;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(2) Danford (H.K.) limited (&rdquo;Investor&rdquo;)&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Authorized representative:&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: Rooms 05-07, 37F, The Center, 99, Queen&rsquo;s Road,
	Hong Kong
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(3) Dongjin Investment Co., Ltd. (&rdquo;Cayman Company&rdquo;
	or &ldquo;Dongjin Investment&rdquo;)&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Authorized representative:&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: P.O. Box 613 GT, 4
<SUP>
	TH
</SUP>
	Floor Harbour Centre,
	George Town, Grand Cayman K Y 1-1107, Cayman Islands
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(4) Beijing Cairuitong Technology Co., Ltd. (&rdquo;WFOE&rdquo;
	or &ldquo;CRT&rdquo;)&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Legal representative: Ma Yong&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: Room 401, Building 1, Courtyard 1, Shangdi Road East,
	Haidian District, Beijing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(5) Caifu Xinying Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. (&rdquo;Domestic-funded
	Company&rdquo; or &ldquo;CFXY&rdquo;)&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Legal representative: Ma Yong&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: Room 1108, Building 29, Courtyard 9, An&rsquo;ning Zhuang
	Road West, Haidian District, Beijing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(6) Beijing Cowboy Network Technology Co., Ltd. (&rdquo;Cowboy
	Network&rdquo;)&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Legal representative: Lu Yuxun&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence: Room1702, 17F, 28, Beisanhuan Road East, Chaoyang District,
	Beijing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(7) Ma Yong&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	ID card number:&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence&#65306;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(8) Wang Yongzhe&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	ID card number:&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Residence:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage263"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	WHEREAS:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(1) Dongjing Investment is a limited company incorporated and validly
	existing under laws of Cayman, which, through Dongjing Investment Service Limited, one of its subsidiaries in Hong Kong, incorporates
	CRT, a wholly-funded subsidiary of Dongjing Investment in Beijing; CRT and CFXY and its shareholders (Ma Yong and Wang Yongzhe)
	have entered into a series of control agreements set out in the Exhibit 1 (collectively referred to as the &ldquo;VIE Agreement&rdquo;).
	Cayman Company realizes its control over agreements of CFXY through arrangements made in such VIE agreement. Cowboy Network is
	a subsidiary in which CFXY holds 90% equity;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(2) Investor, a wholly-funded subsidiary indirectly controlled by
	the Financial Sector, acquired shares of Cayman Company in January 2013, thus holding its 2% equity, thereby indirectly acquiring
	1.8% equity of Cowboy Network. Besides, the Financial Sector holds 10% equity in Cowboy Network through Beijing Zhongcheng Futong
	Technology Co., Ltd. (&rdquo;ZCFT&rdquo;);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(3) Cowboy Network intends to return red chip and seeks for listing
	and trading in domestic capital market of China (the &ldquo;Reorganization&rdquo;);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	THEREFORE, the Parties, through friendly negotiations and based
	on true expression of intent, reached the following agreement for mutual observance with respect to matters related to variation
	in equity of Cowboy Network held by Financial Sector which are involved in this reorganization.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 1 Reorganization scheme
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1 Termination of VIE agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1.1 Each Party acknowledges and agrees that all VIE agreements
	entered into between CRT and CFXY and its shareholders (Ma Yong and Wang Yongzhe) are terminated as of the date of this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1.2 As of the date of this agreement, neither Party will undertake
	any legal or contractual obligation thereunder to the other Party. Neither Party shall take any legal act against the other Party
	with respect to any matter arising out of or in connection with the VIE agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2 Arrangement for variation in equity Financial
	Sector holds in Cowboy Network
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2.1 The 1.8% equity the Financial Sector indirectly holds in Cowboy
	Network through the Investor will be held by ZCFT or any other entity designated by the Financial Sector. For this purpose, CFXY
	shall transfer the 1.8% equity it holds in Cowboy Network to the said transferee for a consideration of RMB 1.00.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2.2 The 1.8% equity the Financial Sector holds in Cowboy Network
	through the ZCFT will be held by Beijing Guorong Chengyuan Technology Co., Ltd. or any other entity designated by the Financial
	Sector.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2.3 The 5.00004% equity the Financial Sector holds in Cowboy Network
	through the ZCFT will be held by Caifuqicheng (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. or any other entity designated by the Financial Sector.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2.4 The 4.99996% equity the Financial Sector holds in Cowboy Network
	through the ZCFT will be held by Shenzhen Shangtong Software Co., Ltd. or any other entity designated by the Financial Sector.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage264"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.3 Principle of reorganization
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.3.1 The Parties acknowledge and agree that reorganization arrangements
	hereunder represent agreement the Parties reach through equitable negotiations based on true expression of their own intents. The
	Parties undertake that they will do their own utmost efforts and will cause their affiliates to promote full implementation of
	reorganization target contemplated herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.3.2 The Parties shall be responsible for coordination within transition
	period in principles of reliance on and responsible for each other to lay good foundation for their future development and cooperation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 2 Reorganization steps and closing
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.1 Execution of relevant implementation documents
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	After this agreement is executed, the Parties will coordinate and
	will cause their affiliates involved in the reorganization to coordinate with each other to execute necessary implementation documents
	for the restructuring based on conditions and principles set forth herein within reasonable time as soon as practicable, including
	but not limited to (1) agreement for transfer of equity of Cowboy Network; (2) necessary resolution documents (resolution of shareholder&rsquo;s
	meeting and resolution of board of directors).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.2 Performing variation registration procedures
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	After the above relevant implementation documents are executed,
	the Parties and they will cause their affiliates involved in the reorganization to provide cooperation positively to perform registration
	procedures necessary for the change with respect to matters involved in the reorganization with competent governmental authority
	(including but not limited to authority for commercial &amp; industrial administration) to realize the objective of reorganization
	set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 3 Confidentiality
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Parties shall take appropriate actions to keep in strict confidence
	any information and date involved in formation and performance of this agreement, and either party, without written consent of
	the other party, shall not disclose information and data relating to cooperation (unless information is provided for professional
	organizations appointed with consent of the Parties and documents are submitted to governmental authority).The Parties shall cause
	their staff to keep in confidence their trade secret the staff obtains or knows during his or her performance of duty, and staff
	of either Party, without consent of the other Party, shall not use or disclose the said confidential information it obtains during
	his or her work other than the cooperation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage265"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 4 Breach of contract and liability
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.1 Breach of contract
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Failure of either Party or its affiliate involved in the reorganization
	to perform the whole or part of or to properly perform its obligations hereunder, or violation of any provision hereof by such
	Party or such affiliate constitute breach of contract (the breaching party referred to as &ldquo;Defaulting Party&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.2 Liability for breach of contract
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The defaulting party shall be liable for any and all actual direct
	losses, damages, costs or liabilities of other Parties due to the breach of contract. In the event that the fault is attributable
	to the Parties, each Party shall bear their own liability and loss on the basis of facts. For avoidance of ambiguity, the defaulting
	party in no event shall be liable to other Parties for any indirect or incidental loss or damage, and any loss of profit due to
	such breach.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 5 Governing law and settlement of dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.1 Governing law
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Conclusion, performance and interpretation of this agreement shall
	be governed by current laws and regulations of China.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.2. Settlement of dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Any dispute and claim arising out of or in connection with interpretation,
	breach, termination and effect of this agreement shall be settled through friendly negotiations. Either Party shall commence its
	negotiations with respect to dispute with other Parties upon receipt of written request for negotiations from other Parties In
	the event that the dispute cannot be settled within thirty (30) days upon negotiations, either Party may submit the dispute to
	Beijing Arbitration Commission for arbitration under its rules in Beijing. Arbitration award is final and binding upon the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 6 Supplementary provisions
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1 Effectiveness of agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1.1 This agreement comes into force from the date of its execution
	by legal representatives or authorized representatives of the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1.2 This agreement is intended to define consensus reached by
	the Parties and their relevant related parties in principle with respect to the transaction. The Parties and any other related
	party shall negotiate and execute exact legal documents in connection with the transaction in principles set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1.3 Exact legal document executed by the Parties and related parties
	in future shall fall within the framework of principles set out herein. Any provision of any such exact legal document that violates
	this agreement shall be invalid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 6 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage266"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.2 Termination of agreement and legal consequence
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.2.1 This agreement may be terminated with consensus reached by
	the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.2.2 Termination of any transaction document shall neither influence
	right or debt of either Party incurred or accumulated up to such termination, including accrued or accumulated debts to other Parties
	under such transaction document and applicable laws, or any claim against other Parties or Party to which such Party is entitled
	under such transaction document, nor influence any provision that survives from termination expressed or implied in such transaction
	document.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.2.3 Article 3 (Confidentiality), Article 4 (Breach of contract
	and liability), Article 5 (Governing law and settlement of dispute), and this Article 6 (Supplementary provisions) hereof shall
	survive from termination of this agreement and any other transaction document and remain binding upon the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.3 Amendment
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Any amendment to, supplement to or alteration of this agreement
	shall be made in writing only, and shall not come into force and have binding effects until it is signed by authorized representatives
	of the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.4 Counterpart
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This agreement shall be made in octuplicate, with each Party holding
	one copy, each of which shall have the same legal effects.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	(Intentionally left blank below)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7 -->

	&nbsp;
</TD>

	IN WITNESS WHEREOF,
</B>
	Duly authorized representatives of each
	Party have executed this agreement in the place and on the date on the first written.
