<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article 5. Confidentiality
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The parties shall take reasonable steps
	to keep strict confidentiality of any materials or information involved in the execution and performance of this Agreement. Without
	prior written consent of the other parties, no party shall disclose any relevant materials or information related to the cooperation
	to others, unless to the employed professional institute agreed upon by the parties or to related government authorities for the
	purpose of filing or registration. The parties shall cause their respective employees to keep confidentiality of the trade secrets
	of the parties which may be obtained or assessed by such employees in his/her line of duty. Without consent of the parties, any
	employees from any party shall not make use of or disclose any of the aforesaid confidential information obtained from his/her
	work for any purpose other than the cooperation herein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 19; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	19
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage337"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article 6. Breach
	and Liability
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6.1 Breach of
	the Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any party fails of performance any obligations
	hereunder, partial or wholly, or performs any obligations hereunder inadequately, or violates any provisions hereof, whether by
	act or omission, shall constitute breach of the Agreement (the party committed such breach hereinafter referred as the &ldquo;Breaching
	Party&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6.2 Material Breach
	of the Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any breach of the Agreement which cannot
	be cured and caused material losses to other parties shall be deemed as material breach of the Agreement; any breach which can
	be cured however the Breaching Party failed to cure the same within thirty (30) days upon notice of the non-Breaching Party shall
	also be deemed as material breach of the Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 20; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	20
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage338"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	6.3 Liability
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1) The Breaching Party shall be responsible
	for any actual and direct losses, damages, liabilities, all taxes, cost and expenses(including but not limited to attorney fees,
	travelling fees, charges, agent fees) caused by such breach to other parties. If&nbsp;the parties&nbsp;are all&nbsp;in&nbsp;fault,
	they shall&nbsp;each&nbsp;bear their proper&nbsp;share&nbsp;of&nbsp;the liabilities and losses in accordance with the circumstances.
	For avoidance of doubt, in no case shall the Breaching Party be responsible for any indirect or accidental losses or damage, and
	any profit losses caused by such breach. In case of a material breach of the Agreement, the non-Breaching Party shall be entitled
	to terminate this Agreement and request the Breaching Party to compensate any losses or assume liabilities subject to the provisions
	of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2) If the Sellers refuse to continue
	to perform this Agreement without any reason after the Purchasers made the first payment in accordance with Article 2.2(1) hereof,
	and still refuse to perform within thirty(30) days upon written notice of the Purchasers, it should be deemed as a material breach
	of the Agreement, accordingly the Purchasers shall be entitled to terminate this Agreement, meanwhile the Sellers shall refund
	the first payment to the Purchasers and shall pay a penalty equivalent to the first payment (eg.:RMB30 Million) to the Purchasers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 21; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	21
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage339"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3) If the Purchasers fails to timely
	pay any payment of the Purchase Consideration to Tibet Company subject to any provision of this Agreement, Purchase shall pay
	an overdue penalty on daily basis&nbsp;at a rate&nbsp;of&nbsp;5 per 10,000&nbsp;per&nbsp;day&nbsp;of due&nbsp;total&nbsp;amount&nbsp;charged
	from the date when delay&nbsp;of&nbsp;payment has taken place. If the Purchasers delay to pay any payment of the Purchase Consideration
	and failed to make the payment with thirty (30) days upon written notice of the Sellers, it shall be deemed as a material breach
	of the Agreement, accordingly the Sellers shall be entitled to terminate the Agreement, meanwhile the Purchase shall pay a penalty
	equivalent to the first payment (eg.:RMB30 Million) to the Sellers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article 7. Governing
	Law and Dispute Resolution
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7.1 Governing
	Law
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This agreement including its execution
	and performance shall be governed and construed by current laws and regulations of P. R. C. China.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 22; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

	22

<A NAME="eolPage340"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	7.2 Dispute Resolution
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any dispute or claim arising out of
	or in relation to interpretation, breach, termination or effect of the Agreement shall be resolved via amicable negotiation. Where
	a dispute taken place, any party shall commerce a negotiation with other parties upon receipt of written request for negotiation
	delivered from other party/parties. If the dispute cannot be resolved with thirty (30) days after the commencement of negotiation
	by the parties, any party may submit the dispute before the China&nbsp;International&nbsp;Economic&nbsp;and&nbsp;Trade&nbsp;Arbitration&nbsp;Commission&nbsp;(&ldquo;CIETAC&rdquo;)
	for arbitration in accordance with the rules of arbitration of CIETAC in Beijing. The arbitration award is final and binding upon
	the parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 23; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	23
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="eolPage341"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article 8. By-laws
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8.1 Legal Force
	of the Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1) This Agreement shall be in force
	as the date of execution by respective legal representative of the parties and affirmed the seal.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2) The Agreement intends to specify
	the principle agreement reached by each party and other relevant parties with regard to the Transaction. Each party and other
	relevant parties shall further negotiate and execute other specific legal documents related to this Transaction in accordance
	with the principles set forth in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3) Specific legal documents hereinafter
	executed by each party and other relevant parties shall be within the framework set forth in this Agreement. Any provisions or
	terms of the specific legal documents violating any provisions of this agreement shall be void and null.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8.2 Termination
	of the Agreement and Legal Consequences
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(1)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement may be terminated upon agreement of the parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 19.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(2)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any
	termination of any transaction documents shall neither affect any rights or liabilities
	occurred or accumulated before the termination, including any liabilities occurred or
	accumulated by such party to other parties subject to such transaction documents and
	applicable law, or any claim may be arisen by such party subject to such transaction
	documents against other party (parties), nor shall such termination affect any provisions
	that should survive the termination expressly or implicitly incorporated in such transaction
	documents.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(3)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	After
	the termination of this Agreement or any other transaction documents, Article 5 (Confidentiality),
	Article 6 ( Breach and Liability) and Article 7 (Governing Law and Dispute Resolution)
	and Article 8 (By-laws) shall survive and binding upon the parties.
</FONT>
</TD>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8.3 Amendment
	of the Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any amendment, supplement or change
	of this Agreement shall not be valid and binding upon the parties unless made in written and executed by authorized representative
	of the parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8.4 Counterpart
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This agreement is made in octuplicate,
	each of which may be held by one party, and each copy shall has the same legal effect.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

<A NAME="eolPage346"></A>
<A NAME="EXH_4127_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_13"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.127
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Share Transfer Agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 32PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is jointly made and executed in the Company&rsquo;s
	conference room on Aug. 27, 2015 by and between the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Transferor: Shanghai Meining Computer Software Co., Ltd. (hereinafter
	as &ldquo;Party A&rdquo;);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Transferee: Beijing Glory Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter as &ldquo;Party
	B&rdquo;); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter
	referred to as the &ldquo;Subject Company&rdquo;) owns registered capital of RMB 100,000, 5% of which is contributed by Party A,
	i.e. RMB 5,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The parties agree as follows through negotiation and pursuit to
	the provisions of relevant laws and regulations:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 1 Subject Matter and Price of Equity Transfer
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A transfers 5% of equities in the Subject Company to the new
	shareholder, Beijing CFO Glory Technology Co., Ltd., at a price of RMB5,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 2 Other rights adhere to the equities
	will be transferred together with the equities upon the equity transfer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 103PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 3 The Transferee shall pay the transfer
	price off regarding the equity transfer to the Transferor within fifteen (15) days upon execution of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 4 Undertaking and Warrants
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A warrants that it owns the legal title of, as well as complete
	and effective right of disposal of such equities to be transferred to Party B under Article 1 hereof. Party A warrants that no
	pledge or mortgage or other encumbrance is set on the contemplated equities hereof and thereby it shall be free from any third
	person&rsquo;s claim thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage347"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 5 Liabilities for Breach
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party B undertakes to fully pay off the payment regarding the equity
	transfer within the agreed timeframe; otherwise, it shall be deemed as a breach of the Agreement and Party B shall pay a penalty
	at the rate of 0.3 percent per day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	Article 6 Resolution of Dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is governed and construed by the relevant laws of
	the People&rsquo;s Republic of China. Any disputes resulting from or in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved through
	friendly negotiation by the Parties hereto, otherwise, such dispute shall be submitted to Shanghai Arbitration Commission for arbitration
	or directly before a competent people&rsquo;s court.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	Article 7 Miscellaneous
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement is made in quadruplicate, three of which shall be held by the Parties hereto
	and the Subject Company and the forth shall be summited to the competent bureau of industry
	for the purpose of relevant procedures.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement shall come into effect upon execution by each Party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	credit and debt of the Company prior to the equity transfer shall be enjoyed and borne
	by the Transferor and thereafter by the Transferee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	Party A: (Signature)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	Party B: (Signature)
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 16.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(Aug. 27, 2015)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 16.5PT">
	&nbsp;

<B>
	Exhibit 4.128
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Share Transfer Agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 32PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is jointly made and executed in the Company&rsquo;s
	conference room on Aug. 27, 2015 by and between the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	Transferor: Na Zhang
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	(hereinafter as &ldquo;Party A&rdquo;);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
	Transferee: Beijing Glory Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter as &ldquo;Party B&rdquo;); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter
	referred to as the &ldquo;Subject Company&rdquo;) owns registered capital of RMB 100,000, 40% of which is contributed by Party
	A, i.e. RMB 40,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The parties agree as follows through negotiation and pursuit to
	the provisions of relevant laws and regulations:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 1 Subject Matter and Price of Equity Transfer
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49PT">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A transfers 40% of equities in the Subject Company to the
	new shareholder, Beijing CFO Glory Technology Co., Ltd., at a price of RMB40,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 2 Other rights adhere to the equities
	will be transferred together with the equities upon the equity transfer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 103PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 3 The Transferee shall pay the transfer
	price off regarding the equity transfer to the Transferor within fifteen (15) days upon execution of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 4 Undertaking and Warrants
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A warrants that it owns the legal title of, as well as complete
	and effective right of disposal of such equities to be transferred to Party B under Article 1 hereof. Party A warrants that no
	pledge or mortgage or other encumbrance is set on the contemplated equities hereof and thereby it shall be free from any third
	person&rsquo;s claim thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage349"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 5 Liabilities for Breach
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party B undertakes to fully pay off the payment regarding the equity
	transfer within the agreed timeframe; otherwise, it shall be deemed as a breach of the Agreement and Party B shall pay a penalty
	at the rate of 0.3 percent per day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	Article 6 Resolution of Dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is governed and construed by the relevant laws of
	the People&rsquo;s Republic of China. Any disputes resulting from or in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved through
	friendly negotiation by the Parties hereto, otherwise, such dispute shall be submitted to Shanghai Arbitration Commission for arbitration
	or directly before a competent people&rsquo;s court.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article 7 Miscellaneous
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement is made in quadruplicate, three of which shall be held by the Parties hereto
	and the Subject Company and the forth shall be summited to the competent bureau of industry
	for the purpose of relevant procedures.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement shall come into effect upon execution by each Party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	credit and debt of the Company prior to the equity transfer shall be enjoyed and borne
	by the Transferor and thereafter by the Transferee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	Party A: (Signature)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	Party B: (Signature)
</TD>
</TR>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_15"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.129
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Share Transfer Agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 32PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 32PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is jointly made and executed in the Company&rsquo;s
	conference room on Aug. 27, 2015 by and between the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	Transferor: Xun Zhao
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%">
	(hereinafter as &ldquo;Party A&rdquo;);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Transferee: Beijing Premium Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter as
	&ldquo;Party B&rdquo;); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter
	referred to as the &ldquo;Subject Company&rdquo;) owns registered capital of RMB 100,000, 55% of which is contributed by Party
	A, i.e. RMB 55,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The parties agree as follows through negotiation and pursuit to
	the provisions of relevant laws and regulations:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	Article 1 Subject Matter and Price of Equity Transfer
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A transfers 55% of equities in the Subject Company to the
	new shareholder, Beijing Zhongjinjiade Technology Co., Ltd., at a price of RMB55,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	Article 2 Other rights adhere to the equities
	will be transferred together with the equities upon the equity transfer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 103PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 3 The Transferee shall pay the transfer
	price off regarding the equity transfer to the Transferor within fifteen (15) days upon execution of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 4 Undertaking and Warrants
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party A warrants that it owns the legal title of, as well as complete
	and effective right of disposal of such equities to be transferred to Party B under Article 1 hereof. Party A warrants that no
	pledge or mortgage or other encumbrance is set on the contemplated equities hereof and thereby it shall be free from any third
	person&rsquo;s claim thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage351"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 5 Liabilities for Breach
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Party B undertakes to fully pay off the payment regarding the equity
	transfer within the agreed timeframe; otherwise, it shall be deemed as a breach of the Agreement and Party B shall pay a penalty
	at the rate of 0.3 percent per day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	Article 6 Resolution of Dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is governed and construed by the relevant laws of
	the People&rsquo;s Republic of China. Any disputes resulting from or in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved through
	friendly negotiation by the Parties hereto, otherwise, such dispute shall be submitted to Shanghai Arbitration Commission for arbitration
	or directly before a competent people&rsquo;s court.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 42PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Article 7 Miscellaneous
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement is made in quadruplicate, three of which shall be held by the Parties hereto
	and the Subject Company and the forth shall be summited to the competent bureau of industry
	for the purpose of relevant procedures.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	This
	Agreement shall come into effect upon execution by each Party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24.55PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
	credit and debt of the Company prior to the equity transfer shall be enjoyed and borne
	by the Transferor and thereafter by the Transferee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.130
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<B>
	Share Transfer Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<B>
	Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory and Investment Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is jointly made and executed in Beijing on Dec. 10,
	2015 by the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party A: Shanghai Meining Computer Software
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party B: Zhiwei Zhao
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party C: Jun Wang
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	(Party A, Party B and Party C collectively
	referred to as &ldquo;Transferor&rdquo;)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party D: Tibet Fortune Jinyuan Network Technology
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party E: Zhongcheng Futong Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	(Party D and Party E Collectively as &ldquo;Transferee&rdquo;)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory and Investment
	Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;Subject Company&rdquo;) with registered capital of RMB 60,000,000, 2.5% of its
	equity is held by Party A, 55% by Party B and 42.5% by Party C. The above parties reach to the following terms regarding the matter
	of equity transfer through joint negotiation and in accordance with the provisions of relevant laws and regulations:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24.1PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 1 Purposes and Price of Equity Transfer
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21.3PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
	Party A will transfer its 2.5% equities of the Subject Company to the new shareholder, Party E, at a price of RMB 1,133,432.56;
	Party B will transfer its 10% equities of the Subject Company to the new shareholder, Party D, at a price of RMB 1,641,025.64,
	and the remaining 45% to Party E at a price of RMB 7,384,615.36; Party C will transfer its 42.5% equities of the Subject Company
	to the new shareholder, Party E for RMB 6,974,359.00; and the Transferee agrees to accept the respective equities of the Subject
	Company from the Transferor for the aforesaid prices.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Upon completion of the foregoing transfers, Party
	D will hold 10% equities of the Subject Company and Party E will hold the remaining 90% thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 43.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24.1PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 2 Transfer of Rights and Obligations
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.1 &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Other rights adhered to the equities will
	be transferred together with the equities upon the equity transfer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage353"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24.1PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 3 Payment
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.1PT">
	The Transferee shall make a payment in lump sum regarding
	the equity transfer to the Transferor within five (5) days upon execution of this Agreement. The equity transfer prices payable
	to Party B and Party C shall be remitted to the following account:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT">
	Account name: Caifu Software (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT">
	Bank Account: Business Dept. of Beijing Branch of the
	Bank of Communications
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.1PT">
	Account No.: 110060149018002447173
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 24.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24.1PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 4 Undertakings and Warrants
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Transferor warrants that it owns the legal title of, complete
	and effective right of disposal of the equities under Article 1 hereof to be transferred to the Transferee. The Transferor warrants
	that no pledge or mortgage or other encumbrance set on the contemplated equities hereof and thereby it shall be free from any third
	person&rsquo;s claim thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 5 Liability for Breach
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Transferee undertakes to fully pay off the price of equity transfer
	within the agreed period, otherwise, it shall be deemed as a breach of the Agreement and shall pay a penalty at the rate of 0.3
	percent per day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 6 Resolution of Dispute
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is governed and construed by the relevant laws of
	the People&rsquo;s Republic of China. Any disputes resulting from or in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved through
	friendly negotiation, otherwise, such dispute shall be submitted to Beijing Arbitration Commission for arbitration or directly
	with a competent people&rsquo;s court for trial.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24.1PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Article 7 Miscellaneous
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is made in sextuplicate, five of which shall be held by each party and one by the
	Subject Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement shall come into effect upon execution of each Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The credit and debt of the Subject Company prior to the equity transfer will be enjoyed and borne
	by the Transferor and thereafter by the Transferee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	[Following is the Signature page of the Equity
	Transfer Agreement]
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 18PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Regarding the Strategic Consulting and
	Services Agreement,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	The Technical Support Agreement and the
	Operation Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	By
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Among
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Shanghai Chongzhi Information &amp; Technology
	Co., Ltd.,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp;
	Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

	Sep. 20, 2015
</B>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage356"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement of Termination (hereinafter referred to as the
	&ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into in Beijing, PRC (hereinafter &ldquo;China&rdquo;) as of Sep. 20, 2015 by and
	among the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party A: Shanghai Chongzhi Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered address: Unite 106, Building 2, No. 407 Datong
	Road, Bao Town, Chongming County, Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party B: &nbsp;Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp; Technology
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	Registered Address: Unite
	118, Building 2, No. 300 Baozhen South Road, Chongming County, Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	the Strategic Consulting and Services Agreement,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Technical Support Agreement and the
	Operation Agreement in 2009.11.30, in which the two sides agreed to carry out cooperation of strategic consulting services, operational
	support, and technical support.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, each of the parties hereto
	intends to terminate the foregoing Strategic Consulting and Services Agreement, Technical Support Agreement and Operation Agreement
	(hereinafter referred to as the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&ldquo;
</FONT>
	Original Agreements
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.15PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Now Therefore
</B>
	, through friendly negotiation, the Parties
	hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Termination and Exemptions
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree to terminate the Original Agreements as of the execution date of this Agreement.
	The Parties agree to waive any and all causes of action currently made or threaten to be made resulted from or in connection with
	the Original Agreements, regardless of the nature and cause of such causes of action, or whether related to any lawsuit, liability,
	guarantee, breach of contract or commitment, obligation, claims, demand, losses and costs, or whether known at present or not,
	contingent or fixed, occurred in the past or present (collectively as &quot;Claims&quot;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties hereby expressly agree to take any risks arising from unreal facts, unknown facts or
	differences between true facts and the information of acknowledge or relied upon. The parties hereto intends to ultimately and
	permanently resolve all the disputes that exists or may occur in future, resulting from or relating to the Original Agreements,
	in spite of whether the understanding of each of the parties regarding the facts, laws or other circumstances thereof is true.
	Exemption of each party hereto shall completely, thoroughly, unconditionally and immediately supersede all the rights, Claims,
	demands and causes of action that exists or may exist on the execution date hereof. Each Party warrants and undertakes that it
	has carried out independent investigation on the facts, laws or other circumstances relevant to the discussed, referred to or exempted
	matters hereunder that are necessary and required at its independent judgment and discretion. At the time of execution of this
	agreement, no Party relies on any statement, commitment or warrant made by the other parties or persons yet not explicitly provided
	herein regarding existence or none existence of any facts, laws or other circumstances.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage357"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall be responsible
	for the other parties regarding any legal or contractual obligations under the Original Agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall take any legal action against the other parties with respect to any matters
	arising from or relevant to the Original Agreements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Transfer
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party hereby warrants and undertakes that all Claims have been totally and ultimately waived and
	none of the Claims&rsquo; interests was or will be transferred to make against the other parties. It is agreed that in case any
	existing transfer aforesaid whether made on the transferring party&rsquo;s free will or not is alleged by any third party or claimed
	for any interests thereof by any third party, the transferring party shall keep the other parties free from any related liabilities
	and indemnify the other parties for any losses or costs (incl. attorney fees) incurred therefrom.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where any Party or any person on behalf of such Party or any person who alleged obtaining any interests
	in any Claims upon assignment initiates, participates or otherwise seeks relief through a lawsuit against the other parties based
	on any waived Claims hereunder, or arises a Claim waived hereunder against the other parties in any other ways, such party agree
	to directly pay for any attorney fees incurred for defending such Claims by the other parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Miscellaneous
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement is governed and construed by the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the parties hereto in regard to the subject matters
	hereunder and supersedes all the prior concluded agreements, covenants and letters.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each as an original and all counterparts
	together constitute a complete agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is signed by the authorized
	representative of each Party and takes effect as of the execution date. This Agreement is made in duplicate with same effects each
	of which should be held by one party hereto.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	Exhibit 4.132
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
