<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 18PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Regarding the Purchase Option and Cooperation
	Agreement, the Loan Agreement and the Share Pledge Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	By
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Among
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Shanghai Chongzhi Co., Ltd.,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Na Zhang,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Xun Zhao,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and Shanghai Stockstar Information &amp;
	Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Sep. 20, 2015
</B>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage360"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement of Termination (hereinafter referred to as the
	&ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into in Beijing, PRC (hereinafter &ldquo;China&rdquo;) as of Sep. 20, 2015 by and
	among the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party A: Shanghai Chongzhi Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered address: Unite 106, Building 2, No. 407 Datong
	Road, Bao Town, Chongming County, Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party B: Na Zhang
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	ID No.:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party C: Xun Zhao
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	ID No.:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	Party D: &nbsp;Shanghai
	Stockstar Information &amp; Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	Registered Address: Unite
	118, Building 2, No. 300 Baozhen South Road, Chongming County, Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	a Loan Agreement in 2010, in which Party A agrees to loan to Party B and Party C for their purchase of all equities of Party D.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	an Purchase Option and Cooperation Agreement, in which they agree that Party B and Party C grants to Party A or any other eligible
	party designated by Party A an exclusive right of first refusal to purchase, wholly or partially, the equity of Party D held by
	Party B and/or Party C at any time pursuant to the laws of China. Party A on the one hand, Party B and Party C on the other hand
	are hereinafter collectively referred to as &ldquo;Both Parties&rdquo;.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	an Share Pledge Agreement on Jan. 5, 2012, in which the parties agree that Party B and Party C pledge all equity respectively held
	by them in Party D for all of Party D&rsquo;s debts under the services agreement owned to Party A to secure Party A&rsquo;s proper
	collection of all costs from Party D thereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, each of the parties hereto
	intends to terminate the foregoing Purchase Option and Cooperation Agreement, Loan Agreement and Share Pledge Agreement (hereinafter
	referred to as the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&ldquo;
</FONT>
	Original Agreements
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.15PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Now Therefore
</B>
	, through friendly negotiation, the Parties
	hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Termination and Exemptions
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree to terminate the Original Agreements as of the execution date of this Agreement.
	The Parties agree to waive any and all causes of action currently made or threaten to be made resulted from or in connection with
	the Original Agreements, regardless of the nature and cause of such causes of action, or whether related to any lawsuit, liability,
	guarantee, breach of contract or commitment, obligation, claims, demand, losses and costs, or whether known at present or not,
	contingent or fixed, occurred in the past or present (collectively as &quot;Claims&quot;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage361"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties hereby expressly agree to take any risks arising from unreal facts, unknown facts or
	differences between true facts and the information of acknowledge or relied upon. The parties hereto intends to ultimately and
	permanently resolve all the disputes that exists or may occur in future, resulting from or relating to the Original Agreements,
	in spite of whether the understanding of each of the parties regarding the facts, laws or other circumstances thereof is true.
	Exemption of each party hereto shall completely, thoroughly, unconditionally and immediately supersede all the rights, Claims,
	demands and causes of action that exists or may exist on the execution date hereof. Each Party warrants and undertakes that it
	has carried out independent investigation on the facts, laws or other circumstances relevant to the discussed, referred to or exempted
	matters hereunder that are necessary and required at its independent judgment and discretion. At the time of execution of this
	agreement, no Party relies on any statement, commitment or warrant made by the other parties or persons yet not explicitly provided
	herein regarding existence or none existence of any facts, laws or other circumstances.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall be responsible
	for the other parties regarding any legal or contractual obligations under the Original Agreements. The funds under the Loan Agreement
	loaned by Party B and Party C from Party A have been paid off and therefore no Party thereto shall have any rights and assume any
	obligations to the other parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall take any legal action against the other parties with respect to any matters
	arising from or relevant to the Original Agreements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Transfer
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party hereby warrants and undertakes that all Claims have been totally and ultimately waived and
	none of the Claims&rsquo; interests was or will be transferred to make against the other parties. It is agreed that in case any
	existing transfer aforesaid whether made on the transferring party&rsquo;s free will or not is alleged by any third party or claimed
	for any interests thereof by any third party, the transferring party shall keep the other parties free from any related liabilities
	and indemnify the other parties for any losses or costs (incl. attorney fees) incurred therefrom.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where any Party or any person on behalf of such Party or any person who alleged obtaining any interests
	in any Claims upon assignment initiates, participates or otherwise seeks relief through a lawsuit against the other parties based
	on any waived Claims hereunder, or arises a Claim waived hereunder against the other parties in any other ways, such party agree
	to directly pay for any attorney fees incurred for defending such Claims by the other parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement is governed and construed by the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the parties hereto in regard to the subject matters
	hereunder and supersedes all the prior concluded agreements, covenants and letters.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each as an original and all counterparts
	together constitute a complete agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is signed by the authorized
	representative of each Party and takes effect as of the execution date. This Agreement is made in quadruplicate with same effects
	each of which should be held by one party hereto.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

	Exhibit 4.133

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 18PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Termination Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Regarding the Strategic Consulting and
	Service Agreement,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	The Technical Support Agreement and the
	Operation Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	By
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Among
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Fortune Software (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory
	and Investment Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	December. 8, 2015
</B>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage365"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Termination Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Termination Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;)
	is made and entered into in Beijing, PRC (hereinafter &ldquo;China&rdquo;) as of Sep. 20, 2015 by and among the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party A: Fortune Software (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered address: Room 626, Beijing space precision building,
	No. 30 Haidian South Road, Haidian District, Beijing
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party B: Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory and Investment
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	Registered Address.: 301-B
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	No. 8 room
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	No.
	690 Building
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	Bibo Road
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	Strategic Consulting and Service Agreement,
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Technical Support Agreement and the
	Operation Agreement in 2014.5.14, in which the two sides agreed to carry out cooperation of strategic consulting services, operational
	support, and technical support.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, each of the parties hereto
	intends to terminate the foregoing Strategic Consulting and Service Agreement, The Technical Support Agreement and the Operation
	Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&ldquo;
</FONT>
	Original Agreements
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.15PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Now Therefore
</B>
	, through friendly negotiation, the Parties
	hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Termination and Exemptions
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree to terminate the Original Agreements as of the execution date of this Agreement.
	The Parties agree to waive any and all causes of action currently made or threaten to be made resulted from or in connection with
	the Original Agreements, regardless of the nature and cause of such causes of action, or whether related to any lawsuit, liability,
	guarantee, breach of contract or commitment, obligation, claims, demand, losses and costs, or whether known at present or not,
	contingent or fixed, occurred in the past or present (collectively as &quot;Claims&quot;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties hereby expressly agree to take any risks arising from unreal facts, unknown facts or
	differences between true facts and the information of acknowledge or relied upon. The parties hereto intends to ultimately and
	permanently resolve all the disputes that exists or may occur in future, resulting from or relating to the Original Agreements,
	in spite of whether the understanding of each of the parties regarding the facts, laws or other circumstances thereof is true.
	Exemption of each party hereto shall completely, thoroughly, unconditionally and immediately supersede all the rights, Claims,
	demands and causes of action that exists or may exist on the execution date hereof. Each Party warrants and undertakes that it
	has carried out independent investigation on the facts, laws or other circumstances relevant to the discussed, referred to or exempted
	matters hereunder that are necessary and required at its independent judgment and discretion. At the time of execution of this
	agreement, no Party relies on any statement, commitment or warrant made by the other parties or persons yet not explicitly provided
	herein regarding existence or none existence of any facts, laws or other circumstances.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage366"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall be responsible
	for the other parties regarding any legal or contractual obligations under the Original Agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall take any legal action against the other parties with respect to any matters
	arising from or relevant to the Original Agreements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Transfer
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party hereby warrants and undertakes that all Claims have been totally and ultimately waived and
	none of the Claims&rsquo; interests was or will be transferred to make against the other parties. It is agreed that in case any
	existing transfer aforesaid whether made on the transferring party&rsquo;s free will or not is alleged by any third party or claimed
	for any interests thereof by any third party, the transferring party shall keep the other parties free from any related liabilities
	and indemnify the other parties for any losses or costs (incl. attorney fees) incurred therefrom.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where any Party or any person on behalf of such Party or any person who alleged obtaining any interests
	in any Claims upon assignment initiates, participates or otherwise seeks relief through a lawsuit against the other parties based
	on any waived Claims hereunder, or arises a Claim waived hereunder against the other parties in any other ways, such party agree
	to directly pay for any attorney fees incurred for defending such Claims by the other parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Miscellaneous
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement is governed and construed by the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the parties hereto in regard to the subject matters
	hereunder and supersedes all the prior concluded agreements, covenants and letters.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each as an original and all counterparts
	together constitute a complete agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is signed by the authorized
	representative of each Party and takes effect as of the execution date. This Agreement is made in duplicate with same effects each
	of which should be held by one party hereto.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<P STYLE="FONT: 18PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Regarding the Purchase Option and Cooperation
	Agreement and Loan Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	By
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Among
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Fortune Software (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Zhiwei Zhao,
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	and Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory
	and Investment Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

</B>

<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage369"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement of Termination (hereinafter referred to as the
	&ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into in Beijing, PRC (hereinafter &ldquo;China&rdquo;) as of Dec. 20, 2015 by and
	among the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party A: Fortune Software (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered address: Room 626, Beijing space precision building,
	No. 30 Haidian South Road, Haidian District, Beijing
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party B: Zhiwei Zhao
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	ID No.:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party C: Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory and Investment
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered Address.: 301-B
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	No.
	8 room
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	No. 690 Building
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	Bibo
	Road
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	a Loan Agreement in 2014.5.14 in which Party A agrees to loan to Party B for his purchase of all equities of PartyC.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	a Purchase Option and Cooperation Agreementin 2014.5.14, in which they agree that Party B grants to Party A or any other eligible
	party designated by Party A an exclusive right of first refusal to purchase, wholly or partially, the equity of Party C held by
	Party B at any time pursuant to the laws of China. Party A on the one hand, Party B on the other hand are hereinafter collectively
	referred to as &ldquo;Both Parties&rdquo;.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, each of the parties hereto
	intends to terminate the foregoing Loan Agreement, Purchase Option and Cooperation Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&ldquo;
</FONT>
	Original
	Agreements
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.15PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Now Therefore
</B>
	, through friendly negotiation, the Parties
	hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Termination and Exemptions
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree to terminate the Original Agreements as of the execution date of this Agreement.
	The Parties agree to waive any and all causes of action currently made or threaten to be made resulted from or in connection with
	the Original Agreements, regardless of the nature and cause of such causes of action, or whether related to any lawsuit, liability,
	guarantee, breach of contract or commitment, obligation, claims, demand, losses and costs, or whether known at present or not,
	contingent or fixed, occurred in the past or present (collectively as &quot;Claims&quot;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties hereby expressly agree to take any risks arising from unreal facts, unknown facts or
	differences between true facts and the information of acknowledge or relied upon. The parties hereto intends to ultimately and
	permanently resolve all the disputes that exists or may occur in future, resulting from or relating to the Original Agreements,
	in spite of whether the understanding of each of the parties regarding the facts, laws or other circumstances thereof is true.
	Exemption of each party hereto shall completely, thoroughly, unconditionally and immediately supersede all the rights, Claims,
	demands and causes of action that exists or may exist on the execution date hereof. Each Party warrants and undertakes that it
	has carried out independent investigation on the facts, laws or other circumstances relevant to the discussed, referred to or exempted
	matters hereunder that are necessary and required at its independent judgment and discretion. At the time of execution of this
	agreement, no Party relies on any statement, commitment or warrant made by the other parties or persons yet not explicitly provided
	herein regarding existence or none existence of any facts, laws or other circumstances.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage370"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall be responsible
	for the other parties regarding any legal or contractual obligations under the Original Agreements. The funds under the Loan Agreement
	loaned by Party B and Party C from Party A have been paid off and therefore no Party thereto shall have any rights and assume any
	obligations to the other parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall take any legal action against the other parties with respect to any matters
	arising from or relevant to the Original Agreements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Transfer
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party hereby warrants and undertakes that all Claims have been totally and ultimately waived and
	none of the Claims&rsquo; interests was or will be transferred to make against the other parties. It is agreed that in case any
	existing transfer aforesaid whether made on the transferring party&rsquo;s free will or not is alleged by any third party or claimed
	for any interests thereof by any third party, the transferring party shall keep the other parties free from any related liabilities
	and indemnify the other parties for any losses or costs (incl. attorney fees) incurred therefrom.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where any Party or any person on behalf of such Party or any person who alleged obtaining any interests
	in any Claims upon assignment initiates, participates or otherwise seeks relief through a lawsuit against the other parties based
	on any waived Claims hereunder, or arises a Claim waived hereunder against the other parties in any other ways, such party agree
	to directly pay for any attorney fees incurred for defending such Claims by the other parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Miscellaneous
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement is governed and construed by the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the parties hereto in regard to the subject matters
	hereunder and supersedes all the prior concluded agreements, covenants and letters.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each as an original and all counterparts
	together constitute a complete agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is signed by the authorized
	representative of each Party and takes effect as of the execution date. This Agreement is made in triplicate with same effects
	each of which should be held by one party hereto.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF,
</B>
	each Party hereto has caused this
	Agreement to be executed by its authorized signatory as of the day and year first written above.

<A NAME="eolPage374"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Agreement of Termination
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement of Termination (hereinafter referred to as the
	&ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into in Beijing, PRC (hereinafter &ldquo;China&rdquo;) as of Dec. 20, 2015 by and
	among the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party A: Fortune Software (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered address: Room 626, Beijing space precision building,
	No. 30 Haidian South Road, Haidian District, Beijing
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party B: Jun Wang
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	ID No.:370102197012163311
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Party C: Shanghai Stockstar Securities Advisory and Investment
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Registered Address.: 301-B
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	No.
	8 room
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	No. 690 Building
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	Bibo
	Road
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&#65292;
</FONT>
	Shanghai
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 56.7PT; TEXT-INDENT: -56.7PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	a Loan Agreement in 2014.5.14 in which Party A agrees to loan to Party B for his purchase of all equities of PartyC.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the aforesaid parties signed
	an Purchase Option and Cooperation Agreement in 2014.5.14, in which they agree that Party B grants to Party A or any other eligible
	party designated by Party A an exclusive right of first refusal to purchase, wholly or partially, the equity of Party C held by
	Party B at any time pursuant to the laws of China. Party A on the one hand, Party B on the other hand are hereinafter collectively
	referred to as &ldquo;Both Parties&rdquo;.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, each of the parties hereto
	intends to terminate the foregoing Loan Agreement, Purchase Option and Cooperation Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&ldquo;
</FONT>
	Original
	Agreements
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.15PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	Now Therefore
</B>
	, through friendly negotiation, the Parties
	hereby agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Termination and Exemptions
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree to terminate the Original Agreements as of the execution date of this Agreement.
	The Parties agree to waive any and all causes of action currently made or threaten to be made resulted from or in connection with
	the Original Agreements, regardless of the nature and cause of such causes of action, or whether related to any lawsuit, liability,
	guarantee, breach of contract or commitment, obligation, claims, demand, losses and costs, or whether known at present or not,
	contingent or fixed, occurred in the past or present (collectively as &quot;Claims&quot;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties hereby expressly agree to take any risks arising from unreal facts, unknown facts or
	differences between true facts and the information of acknowledge or relied upon. The parties hereto intends to ultimately and
	permanently resolve all the disputes that exists or may occur in future, resulting from or relating to the Original Agreements,
	in spite of whether the understanding of each of the parties regarding the facts, laws or other circumstances thereof is true.
	Exemption of each party hereto shall completely, thoroughly, unconditionally and immediately supersede all the rights, Claims,
	demands and causes of action that exists or may exist on the execution date hereof. Each Party warrants and undertakes that it
	has carried out independent investigation on the facts, laws or other circumstances relevant to the discussed, referred to or exempted
	matters hereunder that are necessary and required at its independent judgment and discretion. At the time of execution of this
	agreement, no Party relies on any statement, commitment or warrant made by the other parties or persons yet not explicitly provided
	herein regarding existence or none existence of any facts, laws or other circumstances.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage375"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall be responsible
	for the other parties regarding any legal or contractual obligations under the Original Agreements. The funds under the Loan Agreement
	loaned by Party B and Party C from Party A have been paid off and therefore no Party thereto shall have any rights and assume any
	obligations to the other parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 48PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Neither Party shall take any legal action against the other parties with respect to any matters
	arising from or relevant to the Original Agreements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.25PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	No Transfer
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party hereby warrants and undertakes that all Claims have been totally and ultimately waived and
	none of the Claims&rsquo; interests was or will be transferred to make against the other parties. It is agreed that in case any
	existing transfer aforesaid whether made on the transferring party&rsquo;s free will or not is alleged by any third party or claimed
	for any interests thereof by any third party, the transferring party shall keep the other parties free from any related liabilities
	and indemnify the other parties for any losses or costs (incl. attorney fees) incurred therefrom.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where any Party or any person on behalf of such Party or any person who alleged obtaining any interests
	in any Claims upon assignment initiates, participates or otherwise seeks relief through a lawsuit against the other parties based
	on any waived Claims hereunder, or arises a Claim waived hereunder against the other parties in any other ways, such party agree
	to directly pay for any attorney fees incurred for defending such Claims by the other parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Miscellaneous
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement is governed and construed by the laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the parties hereto in regard to the subject matters
	hereunder and supersedes all the prior concluded agreements, covenants and letters.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each as an original and all counterparts
	together constitute a complete agreement.

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is signed by the authorized
	representative of each Party and takes effect as of the execution date. This Agreement is made in triplicate with same effects
	each of which should be held by one party hereto.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

</B>
	each Party hereto has caused this
	Agreement to be executed by its authorized signatory as of the day and year first written above.
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage378"></A>
<A NAME="EXH_4136_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_22"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.136
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Equity Transfer
	Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Zhongcheng Futong Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is jointly made and executed
	in Beijing on Dec. 24, 2015 by the following parties:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party A: Tibet Fortune
	Jinyuan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36.15PT">
<B>
	(Party A as &ldquo;Transferor&rdquo;)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36.15PT">
<B>
	Party B: Shanghai
	EBI Capital Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	Party C: Xiaoming
	Wang
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	(Party B and Party
	C collectively referred to as &ldquo;Transferee&rdquo;)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, Zhongcheng Futong Co.,
	Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;Subject Company&rdquo;) with registered capital of RMB 32,000,000, 100% of its equity
	is held by Party A. The above party reach to the following terms regarding the matter of equity transfer through joint negotiation
	and in accordance with the provisions of relevant laws and regulations:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 1 Purposes
	and Price of Equity Transfer
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	1.1
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Party A will transfer its 99.97% equities of the Subject Company to the new shareholder, Party B, at a price of RMB 59,982,000;
	Party B agrees to accept the 99.97% equities of the Subject Company from the Transferor at a price of RMB 59,982,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	1.2
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Party A will transfer its 0.03% equities of the Subject Company to the new shareholder, Party C, at a price of RMB 18,000;
	Party C agrees to accept the 0.03% equities of the Subject Company from the Transferor at a price of RMB 18,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Upon completion of the
	foregoing transfers, Party B will hold 99.97% equities of the Subject Company and Party C will hold 0.03% equities of the Subject
	Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 2 Transfer
	of Rights and Obligations
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	Other rights adhered
	to the equities will be transferred together with the equities upon the equity transfer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 3 Payment
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	The Transferee shall make a
	payment in lump sum regarding the equity transfer to the Transferor within five (5) days upon execution of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 4 Undertakings
	and Warrants
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	The Transferor warrants that it owns the
	legal title of, complete and effective right of disposal of the equities under Article 1 hereof to be transferred to the Transferee.
	The Transferor warrants that no pledge or mortgage or other encumbrance set on the contemplated equities hereof and thereby it
	shall be free from any third person&rsquo;s claim thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	1
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage379"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 5 Liability
	for Breach
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	The Transferee undertakes to fully pay
	off the price of equity transfer within the agreed period, otherwise, it shall be deemed as a breach of the Agreement and shall
	pay a penalty at the rate of 0.3 percent per day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 24PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 6 Resolution of Dispute
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 20PT">
	This Agreement is governed and construed
	by the relevant laws of the People&rsquo;s Republic of China. Any disputes resulting from or in connection with this Agreement
	shall be resolved through friendly negotiation, otherwise, such dispute shall be submitted to Beijing Arbitration Commission for
	arbitration or directly with a competent people&rsquo;s court for trial.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 20PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Article 7 Miscellaneous
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement is made in quadruplicate, three of which shall be held by each party and one by
	the Subject Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement shall come into effect upon execution of each Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 24PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The credit and debt of the Subject Company prior to the equity transfer will be enjoyed and borne
	by the Transferor and thereafter by the Transferee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	[Following is the Signature
	page of the Equity Transfer Agreement]
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Party A:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Tibet Fortune Jinyuan Network Technology
	Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(Seal)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Party B:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Shanghai EBI Capital Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Party C:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Xiaoming Wang (Signature)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

	Agreement dated on April 8, 2016 is signed and entered into by and among the following Parties.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Foreword:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(A) The Transferor is the beneficial owner
	of all equities issued by
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	the Target Company
</FONT>
	. The summary information of the Target Company
	is listed in
<B>
	Appendix 1
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(B) The Target Company has obtained all
	approvals, certificates, licenses that shall be obtained for operating the Business (see the definition below), which remain effective
	at the present. The duplicate of the license for such Business and related search results are stated in
<B>
	Appendix 2
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(C) The Transferor agrees to, on the terms
	and conditions of this Agreement, sell the Salable Equities (see the definition below) to Tianfeng Securities or a third party
	designated thereby (collectively referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Buyer
</B>
	&rdquo;) and the Buyer agrees to purchase such equities
	on the same terms and conditions. From the signature date of this Agreement to the time when the transaction is carried out, the
	Transferor is the beneficial owner of the Salable Equities.
<BR>
	(D) The Parties and other persons signed an
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	agreement
	for sale of 100% equities of the Target Company and 100% equities of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	iSTAR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	International
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Futures
</FONT>
	Co. Limited
<B>
</B>
	(&ldquo;
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	iSTAR
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Futures
</FONT>
</B>
	&rdquo;)
	and a supplementary agreement thereto (collectively referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Previous Sale Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;) on March 30,
	2015, April 9, 2015, and September 28, 2015. Tianfeng Securities, according to the provisions of the Previous Sale Agreement, has
	paid RMB 33,000,000 Yuan (&ldquo;
<B>
	Cash Guarantee
</B>
	&rdquo;) to Beijing Fuhua Innovation &amp; Technology Development Co., Ltd.
	(&ldquo;
<B>
	Beijing Fuhua
</B>
	&rdquo;) as the cash deposit for the consideration of the Previous Sale Agreement. However, the Parties
	have not completed the delivery pursuant to the Previous Sale Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(E) In accordance with the provisions of
	the Previous Sale Agreement, the Target Company and
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	iSTAR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Futures
	have appointed Mr. Wu Jiangang, the representative of Tianfeng Securities, to serve as the director of such company.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Now therefore, the contracting Parties
	reach and enter into an agreement as follows:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	1. Definitions
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.1 In this Agreement, including the statement
	of fact, appendixes and annexes, the following words shall have the following meanings, unless otherwise required by the context:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.2 &ldquo;Audited Accounts&rdquo; mean
	the audited consolidated financial statements of the Target Company that are prepared according to Hong Kong Accounting Standards
	for three fiscal years up to December 31, 2014 and for three months up to March 31, 2015, including the audited income statement,
	cash flow statement, balance sheet, all notes to financial statements, and auditors&rsquo; reports for such years;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
